content: When I compose a value set in ToF using a URL http://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/mihr/ValueSet/ 2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.111.12.1012 (versus entering the individual codes), the build fails. Any suggestions?
what is this value set, and how does it fail?

Hi Grahame, The value set is Complications of Pregnancy, Childbirth and the Puerperium 2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.111.12.1012 that I am referencing in ToF as a value set URL. When it's in there this error. FHIR-IG-Publisher-Version-Failure.docx
wow that's a spectacular failure. How can I reproduce this?
